attributes.action: Provide cognitive behavioural therapy within two weeks of a diagnosis of depression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cognitive behavioural therapy is a well-proven and essential component of the treatment for depression, an illness that affects up to one-in-four of the population in their lifetime.  It is recommended by the National Institute for Clinical Excellence.  However, the provision of CBT is well below that recommended.
